Tech Shopping Fantastic Polk soundbar hits rock-bottom price in Best Buy deal Jitendra Soni 16T10:47:31 ❘ Updated: 2024-02-16T10:47:42 Polk Audio The Polk Audio MagniFi Max AX SR is one of the best premium soundbars and is now available at a cool 30% discount at Best Buy .
Soundbars are an essential accessory for your home entertainment setup . If paired with a smart TV or a projector , a good soundbar can elevate your content consumption experience to a different level.
The Polk Audio MagniFi Max AX SR is not a run-of-the-mill sound bar. This 5.1.2 channel soundbar is known for offering a cinematic audio experience, and the best part is that it’s 30% at Best Buy right now.
 The soundbar normally sells for $800, but a limited-time deal decreases the retail price to just $560. You can save $240 on the soundbar if you act fast.
 Get the Polk Audio MagniFi Max AX SR from Best Buy Cinematic surround sound for your home theatre The Polk Audio MagniFi Max AX SR or the Polk MagniFi is among the best soundbars and the top choice for a surround sound bar for your home.
The soundbar itself packs 11 speakers apart from a wireless subwoofer and wireless satellite speakers, which are sold separately.

Email Sign up Polk Audio The Polk MagniFi is known for various class-leading features, including VoiceAdjust and Dolby Atmos. Polk’s VoiceAdjust is an incredible feature that automatically boosts dialogues so that you can get crystal clear audio of dialogues but also lets you adjust the levels of audio boost.
 Dolby Atmos lets you enjoy movies, games, or shows by taking your TV-watching experience to a different level.
 Setting up the Polk MagniFi soundbar is fairly straightforward, as it connects to your TV via the HDMI ARC port. It is also compatible with Amazon Alexa, Apple AirPlay 2, and Google Home.
